title: Fix Packaging
body:
**Description of Change**

Move all the non-.NET Core runtimes out of the runtimes folder. 

This is causing issues with platforms that also use it, but are unsupported by .NET Core - eg: Tizen. Tizen uses `tizen-armel` and `linux-x86` which is not good for `dotnet publish`. Also, `runtimes` is getting cluttered.

This PR moves all the platforms into the build folder, next to the .targets that will be including it.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1301
- Related to #1296
